thread.title: My favourite place in Paris
thread.title_full: My favourite place in Paris - Review of Hotel De Nell, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Laura B
title: My favourite place in Paris
text:
The Hotel is boutique and very special decoration. Rooms are so comfortable and bigger than expected. It is a very tranquil area. The Restaurant highly recommended please do not miss the midday menu, it was deliciuos and very well priced. It s better if you book as it is always full with locals.
Room Tip: Any room will be fantastic See more room tips
